text:
The doc says:
XMLCatalogs can appear inside tasks that support this feature or at the same 
level as target - i.e., as children of project for reuse across different 
tasks, e.g. XML Validation and XSLT Transformation. The XML Validate task uses 
XMLCatalogs for entity resolution. The XSLT Transformation task uses 
XMLCatalogs for both entity and URI resolution.

When I had put the <xmlcatalog> element as a child of the project-element, the 
xmlvalidate-task tried to connect to the internet to resolve the dtd.
After i moved the <xmlcatalog> as a child to the <xmlvalidate> it worked fine.
Don't know why this has been closed as invalid as I can reproduce it.
